abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.
pokedexEntries.shield: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
pokedexEntries.shield: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Libero
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

pokedexEntries.sword: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.
pokedexEntries.shield: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Libero
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.
pokedexEntries.shield: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Libero
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

pokedexEntries.sword: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

pokedexEntries.sword: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.
pokedexEntries.shield: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.
pokedexEntries.shield: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
pokedexEntries.shield: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.
pokedexEntries.shield: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what’s around it—and what’s around it can include things over six miles away.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
pokedexEntries.shield: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
pokedexEntries.shield: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may flee rather than risk getting caught in its large mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.
pokedexEntries.shield: It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.

abilities.name: Battery
abilities.description: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores the electricity for later use.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it carries a Charjabug to use as a spare battery, a flying Vikavolt can rapidly fire high-powered beams of electricity.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
pokedexEntries.shield: It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Tinted Lens
abilities.description: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

pokedexEntries.sword: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.
pokedexEntries.shield: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

pokedexEntries.sword: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.
pokedexEntries.shield: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Mirror Armor
abilities.description: Reflects any stat-lowering effects.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.
pokedexEntries.shield: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region’s airborne taxi service.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

pokedexEntries.sword: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
pokedexEntries.shield: It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.
pokedexEntries.shield: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

pokedexEntries.sword: Where people go, these Pokémon follow. If you’re scattering food for them, be careful— several hundred of them can gather at once.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can fly moderately quickly. No matter how far it travels, it can always find its way back to its master and its nest.
pokedexEntries.shield: These bright Pokémon have acute memories. Apparently delivery workers often choose them as their partners.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

pokedexEntries.sword: Females of this species are very capable fliers, particularly notable for their stamina. They also take longer to adjust to people.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon is intelligent and intensely proud. People will sit up and take notice if you become the Trainer of one.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Stakeout
abilities.description: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

pokedexEntries.sword: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.
pokedexEntries.shield: Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Stakeout
abilities.description: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.

pokedexEntries.sword: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.
pokedexEntries.shield: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

pokedexEntries.sword: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.
pokedexEntries.shield: Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside Galar acquired this appearance. If you’ve lost something, this Pokémon can likely find it.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its fur is strong and supple. Shaving brushes made with shed Linoone hairs are highly prized.
pokedexEntries.shield: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.
pokedexEntries.shield: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.
pokedexEntries.shield: If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pokedexEntries.sword: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land. That is how it began to live floating in the water.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.
pokedexEntries.shield: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pokedexEntries.sword: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it remains still, it looks just like a real nut. It delights in surprising foraging Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
pokedexEntries.shield: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
pokedexEntries.shield: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.
pokedexEntries.shield: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It steals things from people just to amuse itself with their frustration. A rivalry exists between this Pokémon and Nickit.
pokedexEntries.shield: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pokedexEntries.sword: Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey without making any sound at all. It competes with Thievul for territory.

abilities.name: Ball Fetch
abilities.description: Retrieves a Poké Ball from a failed throw.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.
pokedexEntries.shield: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.
pokedexEntries.shield: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: It excels at digging holes. Using its ears, it can dig a nest 33 feet deep in one night.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: With power equal to an excavator, it can dig through dense bedrock. It’s a huge help during tunnel construction.
pokedexEntries.shield: The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally well. People used to make heavy winter clothing from fur shed by this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
pokedexEntries.shield: They pet each other with their tails as a form of greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier is a bit more boastful.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
pokedexEntries.shield: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its body gives off a sweet, fruity scent that is extremely appetizing to bird Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: When under attack, it secretes a sweet and delicious sweat. The scent only calls more enemies to it.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: As it twirls like a dancer, a sweet smell spreads out around it. Anyone who inhales the scent will feel a surge of happiness.
pokedexEntries.shield: Any Corvisquire that pecks at this Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from its sepals followed by a sharp kick.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

abilities.name: Queenly Majesty
abilities.description: Prevents use of priority moves.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: This feared Pokémon has long, slender legs and a cruel heart. It shows no mercy as it stomps on its opponents.
pokedexEntries.shield: A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and soul that will never heal.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
pokedexEntries.shield: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
pokedexEntries.shield: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
pokedexEntries.shield: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

pokedexEntries.sword: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.
pokedexEntries.shield: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

pokedexEntries.sword: The pollen it releases contains poison. If this Pokémon is raised on clean water, the poison’s toxicity is increased.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature changes. When its bud starts to open, that means spring is right around the corner.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.
pokedexEntries.shield: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
pokedexEntries.shield: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: It makes its nest on sheer cliffs. Riding the sea breeze, it glides up into the expansive skies.
pokedexEntries.shield: It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings. It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Drizzle
abilities.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
pokedexEntries.shield: Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It’s soaking up static electricity because it can’t produce a charge on its own.
pokedexEntries.shield: Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out static electricity. They’re often found sticking to Yamper’s hindquarters.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

pokedexEntries.sword: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.
pokedexEntries.shield: It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are not yet good at flying.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
pokedexEntries.shield: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
pokedexEntries.shield: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
pokedexEntries.shield: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
pokedexEntries.shield: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
pokedexEntries.shield: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.
pokedexEntries.shield: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
pokedexEntries.shield: Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.

abilities.name: Ice Body

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
pokedexEntries.shield: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.
pokedexEntries.shield: People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
pokedexEntries.shield: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.
pokedexEntries.shield: It looks strong, and that’s exactly what it is. As the weather grows colder, its ice tusks grow longer, thicker, and more impressive.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.
pokedexEntries.shield: It has a generous habit of sharing its food with people and Pokémon, so it’s always scrounging around for more food.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces happily around, even in environments as cold as −150 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: After a woman met her end on a snowy mountain, her regrets lingered on. From them, this Pokémon was born. Its favorite food is frozen souls.
pokedexEntries.shield: It spits out cold air of nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit to freeze its quarry. It brings frozen prey back to its lair and neatly lines them up.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
pokedexEntries.shield: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
pokedexEntries.shield: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.description: Raises Defense when attacked.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

pokedexEntries.sword: Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its own body weight pose no issue for this Pokémon. It’s skilled at making use of mud.
pokedexEntries.shield: It eats dirt to create mud and smears this mud all over its feet, giving them the grip needed to walk on rough terrain without slipping.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.description: Raises Defense when attacked.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

pokedexEntries.sword: Mud that hardens around a Mudsdale’s legs sets harder than stone. It’s so hard that it allows this Pokémon to scrap a truck with a single kick.
pokedexEntries.shield: Mudsdale has so much stamina that it could carry over 10 tons across the Galar region without rest or sleep.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it finds a stone appealing, it creates a hole inside it and uses it as its home. This Pokémon is the natural enemy of Roggenrola and Rolycoly.
pokedexEntries.shield: It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.

abilities.name: Sturdy

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: This highly territorial Pokémon prefers dry climates. It won’t come out of its boulder on rainy days.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its thick claws are its greatest weapons. They’re mighty enough to crack Rhyperior’s carapace.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

pokedexEntries.sword: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon was created from clay. It received orders from its master many thousands of years ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

pokedexEntries.sword: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.
pokedexEntries.shield: There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn’t been proven.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: Late at night, it appears beside people’s pillows. As it feeds on dreams, the patterns on its body give off a faint glow.
pokedexEntries.shield: It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink when it’s eating a good dream, and black when it’s eating a nightmare.

abilities.name: Forewarn
abilities.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.
pokedexEntries.shield: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: Reflects status- changing moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is extremely good at climbing tree trunks and likes to eat the new sprouts on the trees.
pokedexEntries.shield: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: Reflects status- changing moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
pokedexEntries.shield: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.
pokedexEntries.shield: The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.
pokedexEntries.shield: The moves it uses to take down its prey would make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It lives on snowy mountains. It sinks its legs into the snow to absorb water and keep its own temperature down.
pokedexEntries.shield: The berries that grow around its belly are like ice pops. Galarian Darumaka absolutely love these berries.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it sees any packs of Darumaka going after Snover, it chases them off, swinging its sizable arms like hammers.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon is known to bring blizzards. A shake of its massive body is enough to cause whiteout conditions.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
pokedexEntries.shield: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

pokedexEntries.sword: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
pokedexEntries.shield: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

pokedexEntries.sword: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
pokedexEntries.shield: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: The Pokémon's accuracy is boosted.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.

abilities.name: Wonder Guard
abilities.description: Only supereffective moves will hit.

pokedexEntries.sword: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
pokedexEntries.shield: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
pokedexEntries.shield: Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

pokedexEntries.sword: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
pokedexEntries.shield: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

pokedexEntries.sword: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
pokedexEntries.shield: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It chooses a Pangoro as its master and then imitates its master’s actions. This is how it learns to battle and hunt for prey.
pokedexEntries.shield: Wanting to make sure it’s taken seriously, Pancham’s always giving others a glare. But if it’s not focusing, it ends up smiling.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon is quick to anger, and it has no problem using its prodigious strength to get its way. It lives for duels against Obstagoon.
pokedexEntries.shield: Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of its opponents. It strikes with punches that can turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

pokedexEntries.sword: The two minigears that compose this Pokémon are closer than twins. They mesh well only with each other.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration behind ancient people’s invention of the first gears.

abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

pokedexEntries.sword: When Klang goes all out, the minigear links up perfectly with the outer part of the big gear, and this Pokémon’s rotation speed increases sharply.
pokedexEntries.shield: Many companies in the Galar region choose Klang as their logo. This Pokémon is considered the symbol of industrial technology.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

pokedexEntries.sword: From its spikes, it launches powerful blasts of electricity. Its red core contains an enormous amount of energy.
pokedexEntries.shield: The three gears that compose this Pokémon spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn’t a living creature.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

pokedexEntries.sword: The members of the trio spend all their time together. Each one has a slightly different taste in nectar.
pokedexEntries.shield: It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and the swarm.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: It skillfully commands its grubs in battles with its enemies. The grubs are willing to risk their lives to defend Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.shield: Vespiquen that give off more pheromones have larger swarms of Combee attendants.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

pokedexEntries.sword: It appears in ancient ruins. The pattern on its body doesn’t come from any culture in the Galar region, so it remains shrouded in mystery.
pokedexEntries.shield: Polishing Bronzor to a shine makes its surface reflect the truth, according to common lore. Be that as it may, Bronzor hates being polished.

abilities.name: Levitate

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

pokedexEntries.sword: Some believe it to be a deity that summons rain clouds. When angered, it lets out a warning cry that rings out like the tolling of a bell.
pokedexEntries.shield: Many scientists suspect that this Pokémon originated outside the Galar region, based on the patterns on its body.

abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.
pokedexEntries.shield: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
