abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
pokedexEntries.shield: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.description: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
pokedexEntries.shield: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: True to its honorable-warrior image, it uses the blades on its elbows only in defense of something or someone.
pokedexEntries.shield: Sharply attuned to others’ wishes for help, this Pokémon seeks out those in need and aids them in battle.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.description: Powers up special attacks when burned.

pokedexEntries.sword: Perhaps seeking company, it approaches children. However, it often quickly runs away again when the children play too roughly with it.
pokedexEntries.shield: The gathering of many souls gave rise to this Pokémon. During humid seasons, they seem to appear in abundance.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.description: Powers up special attacks when burned.

pokedexEntries.sword: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.
pokedexEntries.shield: It grabs people and Pokémon and carries them off somewhere. Where do they go? Nobody knows.

abilities.name: Cotton Down
abilities.description: Lowers foe's Speed when hit.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.
pokedexEntries.shield: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cotton Down
abilities.description: Lowers foe's Speed when hit.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.
pokedexEntries.shield: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

pokedexEntries.sword: It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked by bird Pokémon that would love to make off with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
pokedexEntries.shield: The deeper a Cherubi’s red, the more nutrients it has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and tastier its small ball!

abilities.name: Flower Gift
abilities.description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

pokedexEntries.sword: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its folded petals are pretty tough. Bird Pokémon can peck at them all they want, and Cherrim won’t be bothered at all.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

pokedexEntries.sword: From its rear, it sprays a foul-smelling liquid at opponents. It aims for their faces, and it can hit them from over 16 feet away.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it lifts its tail and points its rear at you, beware. It’s about to spray you with a fluid stinky enough to make you faint.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

pokedexEntries.sword: In its belly, it reserves stinky fluid that it shoots from its tail during battle. As this Pokémon’s diet varies, so does the stench of its fluid.
pokedexEntries.shield: It digs holes in the ground to make its nest. The stench of the fluid it lets fly from the tip of its tail is extremely potent.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: Graceful ripples running across the water’s surface are a sure sign that Tympole are singing in high-pitched voices below.
pokedexEntries.shield: It uses sound waves to communicate with others of its kind. People and other Pokémon species can’t hear its cries of warning.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It weakens its prey with sound waves intense enough to cause headaches, then entangles them with its sticky tongue.
pokedexEntries.shield: On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: The vibrating of the bumps all over its body causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and Croagunk are similar species.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.
pokedexEntries.shield: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
pokedexEntries.shield: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

pokedexEntries.sword: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.
pokedexEntries.shield: With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten— Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
pokedexEntries.shield: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

pokedexEntries.sword: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
pokedexEntries.shield: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.shield: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
pokedexEntries.shield: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.
pokedexEntries.shield: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.
pokedexEntries.shield: This weak and pathetic Pokémon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
pokedexEntries.shield: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

pokedexEntries.sword: The water they shoot from their mouths can hit moving prey from more than 300 feet away.
pokedexEntries.shield: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.

abilities.name: Suction Cups
abilities.description: Negates all moves that force switching out.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
pokedexEntries.shield: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

pokedexEntries.sword: Although unattractive and unpopular, this Pokémon’s marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
pokedexEntries.shield: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: Raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

pokedexEntries.sword: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.

abilities.name: Reckless
abilities.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

pokedexEntries.sword: Anglers love the fight this Pokémon puts up on the hook. And there are always more to catch— many people release them into lakes illicitly.
pokedexEntries.shield: In the past, it often appeared on the dinner table. The meat of red-striped Basculin is on the fatty side, and it’s more popular with the youth.

abilities.name: Schooling
abilities.description: Changes Wishiwashi to School Form.

pokedexEntries.sword: Individually, they’re incredibly weak. It’s by gathering up into schools that they’re able to confront opponents.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it senses danger, its eyes tear up. The sparkle of its tears signals other Wishiwashi to gather.

abilities.name: Innards Out
abilities.description: Deals damage upon fainting.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s covered in a slime that keeps its skin moist, allowing it to stay on land for days without drying up.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.
pokedexEntries.shield: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.
pokedexEntries.shield: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
pokedexEntries.shield: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

abilities.name: Steam Engine
abilities.description: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

pokedexEntries.sword: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.

abilities.name: Steam Engine
abilities.description: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

pokedexEntries.sword: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.
pokedexEntries.shield: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Steam Engine
abilities.description: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexEntries.shield: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
pokedexEntries.shield: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
pokedexEntries.shield: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

pokedexEntries.sword: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill’s rampant digging.
pokedexEntries.shield: Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.

abilities.name: Sturdy

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s as hard as steel, but apparently a long soak in water will cause it to soften a bit.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly warm to the touch.

abilities.name: Sturdy

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: If you see its orange crystals start to glow, be wary. It’s about to fire off bursts of energy.
pokedexEntries.shield: It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever changing the direction it’s facing.

abilities.name: Sturdy

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: This hardy Pokémon can often be found on construction sites and in mines, working alongside people and Copperajah.
pokedexEntries.shield: Although its energy blasts can blow away a dump truck, they have a limitation— they can only be fired when the sun is out.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.
pokedexEntries.shield: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.

abilities.name: Guts

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.
pokedexEntries.shield: Gurdurr excels at demolition—construction is not its forte. In any case, there’s skill in the way this Pokémon wields its metal beam.

abilities.name: Guts

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
pokedexEntries.shield: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.

abilities.name: Unaware

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: Doubles all stat changes.

pokedexEntries.sword: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.
pokedexEntries.shield: It emits ultrasonic waves as it flutters about, searching for its prey—bug Pokémon.

abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

abilities.name: Simple
abilities.description: Doubles all stat changes.

pokedexEntries.sword: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a little while.
pokedexEntries.shield: The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose apparently led some regions to consider Swoobat a symbol of good luck.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Telepathy

pokedexEntries.sword: After nightfall, they emerge from the caves they nest in during the day. Using their ultrasonic waves, they go on the hunt for ripened fruit.
pokedexEntries.shield: No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.

abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Telepathy

pokedexEntries.sword: Aggressive and cruel, this Pokémon will ruthlessly torment enemies that are helpless in the dark.
pokedexEntries.shield: Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone. Its fangs finish the fight.

pokedexEntries.shield: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
pokedexEntries.shield: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Propeller Tail

pokedexEntries.sword: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.
pokedexEntries.shield: After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant swallows it up.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Propeller Tail
abilities.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
pokedexEntries.shield: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Unnerve

pokedexEntries.sword: It loves to collect shiny things. If it’s in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
pokedexEntries.shield: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

abilities.name: Battle Armor

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.description: Boosts the power of contact moves.

abilities.name: Steely Spirit
abilities.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.
pokedexEntries.shield: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
pokedexEntries.shield: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

pokedexEntries.sword: The moment it evolved, it took on a bitter flavor. This is because of the way its cells spontaneously shifted during evolution.
pokedexEntries.shield: The cells that compose its cream fluctuated suddenly during evolution, giving the cream a bitter flavor.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. You can find Cutiefly hovering around Gossifleur, trying to get some of Gossifleur’s pollen.
pokedexEntries.shield: An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can glide around the attack and strike back.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs’ effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.
pokedexEntries.shield: Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or rained on. In the cloudy Galar region, they are very seldom seen.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It defends itself by launching spikes, but its aim isn’t very good at first. Only after a lot of practice will it improve.
pokedexEntries.shield: Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings. Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s spikes grow big and strong.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks, and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb the nutrients it finds within the stone.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes on its feelers into the stone.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: Spirits that wander this world are placed into Pumpkaboo’s body. They’re then moved on to the afterlife.
pokedexEntries.shield: The light that streams out from the holes in the pumpkin can hypnotize and control the people and Pokémon that see it.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

pokedexEntries.sword: Eerie cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are suffering in the afterlife.
pokedexEntries.shield: In the darkness of a new-moon night, Gourgeist will come knocking. Whoever answers the door will be swept off to the afterlife.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.
pokedexEntries.shield: The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.
pokedexEntries.shield: When Pikachu meet, they’ll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
pokedexEntries.shield: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.
pokedexEntries.shield: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

pokedexEntries.sword: When Vaporeon’s fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its body’s cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.
pokedexEntries.shield: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

pokedexEntries.sword: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokémon’s body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexEntries.shield: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: Reflects status- changing moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: By reading air currents, it can predict things such as the weather or its foe’s next move.
pokedexEntries.shield: It unleashes psychic power from the orb on its forehead. When its power is exhausted, the orb grows dull and dark.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

pokedexEntries.sword: When this Pokémon becomes angry, its pores secrete a poisonous sweat, which it sprays at its opponent’s eyes.
pokedexEntries.shield: On the night of a full moon, or when it gets excited, the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

pokedexEntries.sword: Galarians favor the distinctive aroma that drifts from this Pokémon’s leaves. There’s a popular perfume made using that scent.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon’s tail is blade sharp, with a fantastic cutting edge that can slice right though large trees.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: Any who become captivated by the beauty of the snowfall that Glaceon creates will be frozen before they know it.
pokedexEntries.shield: The coldness emanating from Glaceon causes powdery snow to form, making it quite a popular Pokémon at ski resorts.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

abilities.name: Pixilate
abilities.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: By releasing enmity-erasing waves from its ribbonlike feelers, Sylveon stops any conflict.
pokedexEntries.shield: There’s a Galarian fairy tale that describes a beautiful Sylveon vanquishing a dreadful dragon Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ripen
abilities.description: Doubles the effect of berries.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.
pokedexEntries.shield: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.

abilities.name: Ripen
abilities.description: Doubles the effect of berries.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

pokedexEntries.sword: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.
pokedexEntries.shield: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.

abilities.name: Ripen
abilities.description: Doubles the effect of berries.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pokedexEntries.sword: Though Espurr’s expression never changes, behind that blank stare is an intense struggle to contain its devastating psychic power.
pokedexEntries.shield: There’s enough psychic power in Espurr to send a wrestler flying, but because this power can’t be controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pokedexEntries.sword: Revealing the eyelike patterns on the insides of its ears will unleash its psychic powers. It normally keeps the patterns hidden, however.
pokedexEntries.shield: The defensive instinct of the males is strong. It’s when they’re protecting themselves or their partners that they unleash their full power.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

pokedexEntries.sword: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn’t get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
pokedexEntries.shield: The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes Swirlix’s fluffy fur. This Pokémon spits out sticky string to tangle up its enemies.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

pokedexEntries.sword: By taking in a person’s scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It’s hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.
pokedexEntries.shield: Slurpuff’s fur contains a lot of air, making it soft to the touch and lighter than it looks.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

pokedexEntries.sword: A scent pouch within this Pokémon’s body allows it to create various scents. A change in its diet will alter the fragrance it produces.
pokedexEntries.shield: The scent its body gives off enraptures those who smell it. Noble ladies had no shortage of love for Spritzee.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

pokedexEntries.sword: The scent that constantly emits from its fur is so powerful that this Pokémon’s companions will eventually lose their sense of smell.
pokedexEntries.shield: The scents Aromatisse can produce range from sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells that sap an opponent’s will to fight.

abilities.name: Water Bubble
abilities.description: Halves damage from Fire-type moves, doubles power of Water-type moves used, and prevents burns.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
pokedexEntries.shield: Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it comes onto land in search of food, it takes water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.

abilities.name: Water Bubble
abilities.description: Halves damage from Fire-type moves, doubles power of Water-type moves used, and prevents burns.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.
pokedexEntries.shield: It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them inside its bubble and letting them eat any leftover food.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from escaping.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: It tends to move in a pack. Individuals squash against one another to toughen their spirits.
pokedexEntries.shield: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

abilities.name: Shadow Tag
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from escaping.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

pokedexEntries.sword: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
pokedexEntries.shield: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

pokedexEntries.sword: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.
pokedexEntries.shield: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Scrappy
abilities.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.
pokedexEntries.shield: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its antennae, which evolved from a fin, have both positive and negative charges flowing through them.
pokedexEntries.shield: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

pokedexEntries.sword: It makes frightening noises with its poison-filled cheek sacs. When opponents flinch, Croagunk hits them with a poison jab.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once diluted, its poison becomes medicinal. This Pokémon came into popularity after a pharmaceutical company chose it as a mascot.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

pokedexEntries.sword: It bounces toward opponents and gouges them with poisonous claws. No more than a scratch is needed to knock out its adversaries.
pokedexEntries.shield: It booms out a victory croak when its prey goes down in defeat. This Pokémon and Seismitoad are related species.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it locks eyes with you, watch out! Nothing and no one is safe from the reckless headbutts of this troublesome Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has completely stretched out.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: As halfhearted as this Pokémon’s kicks may seem, they pack enough power to shatter Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.
pokedexEntries.shield: While mostly known for having the temperament of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very good care of its family, friends, and territory.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: Thanks to bacteria that lived in the mud flats with it, this Pokémon developed the organs it uses to generate electricity.
pokedexEntries.shield: For some reason, this Pokémon smiles slightly when it emits a strong electric current from the yellow markings on its body.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.
pokedexEntries.shield: The berries stored in its vaselike shell eventually become a thick, pulpy juice.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In one region, it is said to have been born from hardened mud.
pokedexEntries.shield: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

pokedexEntries.sword: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
pokedexEntries.shield: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: There’s speculation that its appearance is determined by what it eats, but the truth remains elusive.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its appearance changes depending on the environment. One theory suggests that living in cold seas causes Shellos to take on this form.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: It secretes a purple fluid to deter enemies. This fluid isn’t poisonous—instead, it’s super sticky, and once it sticks, it’s very hard to unstick.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its body is covered in a sticky slime. It’s very susceptible to dehydration, so it can’t spend too much time on land.

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.description: Switches out when HP drops below half.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s nature’s cleaner—it eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.
pokedexEntries.shield: Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the lookout for danger. They scatter the moment they detect an enemy’s presence.

abilities.name: Emergency Exit
abilities.description: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.

pokedexEntries.sword: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.
pokedexEntries.shield: They live in sunken ships or in holes in the seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.description: Boosts the power of contact moves.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: After two Binacle find a suitably sized rock, they adhere themselves to it and live together. They cooperate to gather food during high tide.
pokedexEntries.shield: If the two don’t work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won’t survive.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Tough Claws
abilities.description: Boosts the power of contact moves.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
pokedexEntries.shield: Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: It will regrow any branches that break off its head. People keep particularly beautiful Corsola branches as charms to promote safe childbirth.
pokedexEntries.shield: These Pokémon live in warm seas. In prehistoric times, many lived in the oceans around the Galar region as well.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Perish Body
abilities.description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.
pokedexEntries.shield: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You’ll become stiff as stone if you touch it.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.
pokedexEntries.shield: It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.
pokedexEntries.shield: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: Reflects status- changing moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.
pokedexEntries.shield: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.

abilities.name: Healer

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: Senses a foe's dangerous moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.
pokedexEntries.shield: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.

pokedexEntries.sword: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.
pokedexEntries.shield: If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.

pokedexEntries.shield: This sneaky Pokémon will slink behind its prey and immobilize it with poisonous gas before the prey even realizes Salandit is there.
