abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s exceedingly energetic, with enough stamina to keep running all through the night. Taking it for walks can be a challenging experience.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can use waves called auras to gauge how others are feeling. These same waves can also tell this Pokémon about the state of the environment.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

pokedexEntries.sword: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.
pokedexEntries.shield: It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers who have justice in their hearts can earn this Pokémon’s trust.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Drought
abilities.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

pokedexEntries.sword: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
pokedexEntries.shield: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.description: Avoids damage for one turn.

pokedexEntries.sword: There will be no forgiveness for any who reveal that it was pretending to be Pikachu. It will bring the culprit down, even at the cost of its own life.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its disguise made from an old rag allowed it to avoid an attack, but the impact broke the neck of the disguise. Now everyone knows it’s a Mimikyu.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

pokedexEntries.sword: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.
pokedexEntries.shield: If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

pokedexEntries.sword: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.
pokedexEntries.shield: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Lowers the foe's Attack stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent’s size.
pokedexEntries.shield: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It envelops its prey in its veillike arms and draws it down to the deeps, five miles below the ocean’s surface.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its thin, veillike arms have tens of thousands of poisonous stingers. Females have slightly longer stingers.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: These Pokémon have body compositions that are mostly identical to seawater. They make their lairs from sunken ships.
pokedexEntries.shield: The crown on its head gets bigger and bigger as it absorbs more and more of the life-force of other creatures.

abilities.name: Merciless
abilities.description: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: The first symptom of its sting is numbness. The next is an itching sensation so intense that it’s impossible to resist the urge to claw at your skin.
pokedexEntries.shield: Unlike their Alolan counterparts, the Mareanie of the Galar region have not yet figured out that the branches of Corsola are delicious.

abilities.name: Merciless
abilities.description: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this Pokémon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing its body so it can capture its own body heat.
pokedexEntries.shield: Within the poison sac in its body is a poison so toxic that Pokémon as large as Wailord will still be suffering three days after it first takes effect.

abilities.name: Gulp Missile
abilities.description: Returns with a catch in its mouth after using Surf or Dive.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.
pokedexEntries.shield: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.
pokedexEntries.shield: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.

abilities.name: Punk Rock
abilities.description: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokémon looks down on all that would challenge it.
pokedexEntries.shield: It has an electrical organ on its chest. While generating electricity, it fills its surroundings with what sounds like the strumming of a bass guitar.

abilities.name: Sand Spit
abilities.description: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.
pokedexEntries.shield: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

abilities.name: Sand Spit
abilities.description: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: It moves through the sands with its mouth open, swallowing sand along with its prey. It gets rid of the sand by spouting it from its nose.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon is active during the day and passes the cold desert nights burrowed snugly into the sand.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: Stones can get stuck in the ports on their bodies. Dwebble help dislodge such stones, so Hippowdon look after these Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: When roused to violence by its rage, it spews out the quantities of sand it has swallowed and whips up a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.description: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

pokedexEntries.sword: They lay their eggs deep inside their nests. When attacked by Heatmor, they retaliate using their massive mandibles.
pokedexEntries.shield: With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can crunch their way through rock. They work together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

pokedexEntries.sword: There’s a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.
pokedexEntries.shield: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon’s electric moves.
pokedexEntries.shield: The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: A now-vanished desert culture treasured these Pokémon. Appropriately, when Heliolisk came to the Galar region, treasure came with them.
pokedexEntries.shield: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

pokedexEntries.sword: It drives its opponents to exhaustion with its agile maneuvers, then ends the fight with a flashy finishing move.
pokedexEntries.shield: It always strikes a pose before going for its finishing move. Sometimes opponents take advantage of that time to counterattack.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Prevents the foe from fleeing.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit in the desert. Once something has fallen in, there is no escape.
pokedexEntries.shield: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
pokedexEntries.shield: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
pokedexEntries.shield: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: These Pokémon nest in the ground and use their tusks to crush hard berries. Crushing berries is also how they test each other’s strength.
pokedexEntries.shield: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: After battle, this Pokémon carefully sharpens its tusks on river rocks. It needs to take care of its tusks—if one breaks, it will never grow back.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents, stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its resilient tusks are its pride and joy. It licks up dirt to take in the minerals it needs to keep its tusks in top condition.
pokedexEntries.shield: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

pokedexEntries.sword: It wanders through ruins by night, carrying a mask that’s said to have been the face it had when it was still human.
pokedexEntries.shield: The spirit of a person from a bygone age became this Pokémon. It rambles through ruins, searching for someone who knows its face.

abilities.name: Wandering Spirit
abilities.description: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

pokedexEntries.sword: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.
pokedexEntries.shield: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.

abilities.name: Mummy
abilities.description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon has a body of sparkling gold. People say it no longer remembers that it was once human.
pokedexEntries.shield: There are many depictions of Cofagrigus decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

pokedexEntries.sword: Honedge’s soul once belonged to a person who was killed a long time ago by the sword that makes up Honedge’s body.
pokedexEntries.shield: The blue eye on the sword’s handguard is the true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it drains people’s lives away.

abilities.name: No Guard
abilities.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

pokedexEntries.sword: Honedge evolves into twins. The two blades rub together to emit a metallic sound that unnerves opponents.
pokedexEntries.shield: The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly alternating between offense and defense to bring down their prey.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.description: Changes form depending on moves used.

pokedexEntries.sword: This stance is dedicated to offense. It can cleave any opponent with the strength and weight of its steel blade.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once upon a time, a king with an Aegislash reigned over the land. His Pokémon eventually drained him of life, and his kingdom fell with him.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.
pokedexEntries.shield: If you’ve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

pokedexEntries.sword: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.
pokedexEntries.shield: The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herd’s pace and direction of travel.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: The swirl pattern in this Pokémon’s body is its weakness. If it gets stirred, the swirl loses its shape, and Sinistea gets dizzy.
pokedexEntries.shield: It absorbs the life-force of those who drink it. It waits patiently, but opportunities are fleeting— it tastes so bad that it gets spat out immediately.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: Trainers Polteageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its tea.
pokedexEntries.shield: When angered, it launches tea from its body at the offender’s mouth. The tea causes strong chills if swallowed.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Synchronize
abilities.description: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

abilities.name: Psychic Surge
abilities.description: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.
pokedexEntries.shield: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

pokedexEntries.sword: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit’s rebirth as this Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost among the trees.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

pokedexEntries.sword: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it’s kind.
pokedexEntries.shield: Small roots that extend from the tips of this Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the forest and give Trevenant control over them.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull’s head. The caps regrow overnight.
pokedexEntries.shield: Morelull live in forests that stay dark even during the day. They scatter flickering spores that put enemies to sleep.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
pokedexEntries.shield: If you see a light deep in a forest at night, don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall fast asleep.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

pokedexEntries.sword: With waves of its fan—made from leaves and its own fur—Oranguru skillfully gives instructions to other Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will gather medicinal herbs to treat it.

abilities.name: Receiver
abilities.description: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

pokedexEntries.sword: Displaying amazing teamwork, they follow the orders of their boss as they all help out in the search for their favorite berries.
pokedexEntries.shield: Passimian live in groups of about 20, with each member performing an assigned role. Through cooperation, the group survives.

abilities.name: Hunger Switch
abilities.description: Changes forms each turn.

pokedexEntries.sword: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.
pokedexEntries.shield: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

pokedexEntries.sword: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass’s orders are absolute.
pokedexEntries.shield: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: Eliminates the effects of weather.

pokedexEntries.sword: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
pokedexEntries.shield: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

pokedexEntries.sword: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
pokedexEntries.shield: Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes explosive compounds to develop in its shell. Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

pokedexEntries.sword: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges electricity indiscriminately.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Ice Scales
abilities.description: Halves damage from Special moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.
pokedexEntries.shield: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.

abilities.name: Shield Dust
abilities.description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

abilities.name: Ice Scales
abilities.description: Halves damage from Special moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokedexEntries.shield: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back. It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
pokedexEntries.shield: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

abilities.name: Electric Surge
abilities.description: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.
pokedexEntries.shield: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

pokedexEntries.sword: Mantyke living in Galar seem to be somewhat sluggish. The colder waters of the seas in this region may be the cause.
pokedexEntries.shield: It swims along with a school of Remoraid, and they’ll all fight together to repel attackers.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

pokedexEntries.sword: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.
pokedexEntries.shield: As it majestically swims, it doesn’t care if Remoraid attach to it to scavenge for its leftovers.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It shows off by spraying jets of seawater from the nostrils above its eyes. It eats a solid ton of Wishiwashi every day.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: Prevents it from becoming infatuated.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

pokedexEntries.sword: They chill the air around them to −150 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing the water in the air into ice that they use as armor.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon lives in areas of frigid cold. It secures itself to the back of an Avalugg by freezing its feet in place.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

pokedexEntries.sword: At high latitudes, this Pokémon can be found with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims among the icebergs.
pokedexEntries.shield: As Avalugg moves about during the day, the cracks in its body deepen. The Pokémon’s body returns to a pristine state overnight.

abilities.name: Steelworker
abilities.description: Powers up Steel-type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

pokedexEntries.sword: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
pokedexEntries.shield: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokémon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It’s active on the night of a full moon.
pokedexEntries.shield: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.
pokedexEntries.shield: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
pokedexEntries.shield: It looks for a Mr. Rime that’s a good dancer and carefully copies the Mr. Rime’s steps like an apprentice.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Filter
abilities.description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.
pokedexEntries.shield: It’s known for its top-notch pantomime skills. It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.

abilities.name: Tangled Feet
abilities.description: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

abilities.name: Screen Cleaner
abilities.description: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

pokedexEntries.sword: It derives its power from fire burning inside its body. If the fire dwindles, this Pokémon will immediately fall asleep.
pokedexEntries.shield: This popular symbol of good fortune will never fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed or pulled.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

abilities.name: Zen Mode
abilities.description: Changes form when HP drops below half.

pokedexEntries.sword: The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon can deliver punches capable of obliterating a dump truck.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon’s power level rises along with the temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Power Spot
abilities.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.
pokedexEntries.shield: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.

abilities.name: Ice Face
abilities.description: Avoids damage from Physical moves for one turn.

pokedexEntries.sword: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.description: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

abilities.name: Stalwart
abilities.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.
pokedexEntries.shield: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: One boy’s invention led to the development of many different machines that take advantage of Rotom’s unique capabilities.
pokedexEntries.shield: With a body made of plasma, it can inhabit all sorts of machines. It loves to surprise others.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

abilities.name: Imposter
abilities.description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

pokedexEntries.sword: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.
pokedexEntries.shield: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.
pokedexEntries.shield: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.
pokedexEntries.shield: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Slush Rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.
pokedexEntries.shield: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
pokedexEntries.shield: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
pokedexEntries.shield: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.

pokedexEntries.sword: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

pokedexEntries.sword: Rumor has it that the theft of top-secret research notes led to a new instance of this Pokémon being created in the Galar region.
pokedexEntries.shield: It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth. The mask placed upon it limits its power in order to keep it under control.

abilities.name: RKS System
abilities.description: Changes type depending on held item.

pokedexEntries.sword: A solid bond of trust between this Pokémon and its Trainer awakened the strength hidden within Silvally. It can change its type at will.
pokedexEntries.shield: The final factor needed to release this Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond with a Trainer it trusts.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

pokedexEntries.sword: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.
pokedexEntries.shield: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

pokedexEntries.sword: Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has outstanding destructive power.
pokedexEntries.shield: It will not stay still, even while it’s a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
pokedexEntries.shield: The quakes caused when it walks make even great mountains crumble and change the surrounding terrain.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it encounters something, its first urge is usually to bite it. If it likes what it tastes, it will commit the associated scent to memory.
pokedexEntries.shield: Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly biting at everything it touches, trying to keep track of its surroundings.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

pokedexEntries.sword: While hunting for prey, Zweilous wanders its territory, its two heads often bickering over which way to go.
pokedexEntries.shield: Their two heads will fight each other over a single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in scars even without battling others.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

pokedexEntries.sword: There are a slew of stories about villages that were destroyed by Hydreigon. It bites anything that moves.
pokedexEntries.shield: The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their target goes down.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if the weather becomes too arid. It’s considered the weakest dragon Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: Their horns are powerful sensors. As soon as Goomy pick up any sign of enemies, they go into hiding. This is how they’ve survived.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: Although this Pokémon isn’t very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.
pokedexEntries.shield: The lump on its back contains its tiny brain. It thinks only of food and escaping its enemies.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

abilities.name: Gooey
abilities.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

pokedexEntries.sword: Sometimes it misunderstands instructions and appears dazed or bewildered. Many Trainers don’t mind, finding this behavior to be adorable.
pokedexEntries.shield: Its form of offense is forcefully stretching out its horns. The strikes land 100 times harder than any blow from a heavyweight boxer.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
pokedexEntries.shield: Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s become as hard as metal.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
pokedexEntries.shield: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: Gives immunity to <q>sound-based</q> moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

pokedexEntries.sword: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
pokedexEntries.shield: Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.
pokedexEntries.shield: If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.
pokedexEntries.shield: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

pokedexEntries.sword: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.
pokedexEntries.shield: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.

abilities.name: Intrepid Sword
abilities.description: Boosts Attack in battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: Now armed with a weapon it used in ancient times, this Pokémon needs only a single strike to fell even Gigantamax Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.shield: Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King’s Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.

abilities.name: Dauntless Shield
abilities.description: Boosts Defense in battle.

pokedexEntries.sword: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master’s Shield. It was feared and respected by all.
pokedexEntries.shield: Now that it’s equipped with its shield, it can shrug off impressive blows, including the attacks of Dynamax Pokémon.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

pokedexEntries.sword: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.
pokedexEntries.shield: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
